item.title: The Hobbyist Restorer Who Rocked the Art World With an A.I. Innovation
item.description: Alex Kachkine spends his days working on microchip research — a skill set surprisingly similar to that needed for restoration.

item.title: Map: 7.5-Magnitude Earthquake Strikes the South Atlantic Ocean
item.description: View the location of the quake’s epicenter and shake area.

item.title: Israel Is Expanding Its Gaza City Operation, but Where Does It Stand?
item.description: The Israeli government is widening its operation in Gaza despite its generals’ advice and as it deliberates on a new cease-fire proposal.
